ComicInfo.Title: Season 2
ComicInfo.Series: Edgar Allan Poe's Snifter of Terror, Season Two
ComicInfo.Summary:
More audaciously reimagined Poe stories! A smart car leads a lobbyist to murder in "The Black Cat!" Plus! The survival of a space station astronaut depends on "The Gold Bug!" Extra! "Poe and the Black Cat" continue their slapstick war, and short prose stories round out this issue. Painted cover by Richard Williams (MAD Magazine).
ContentsThe Black CatThe Gold Bug IIHell Hath No Like InventionEggs of the Dog That Bit YouPoe and the Black Cat*Notes:* The cover is a homage of the cover of The Incredible Hulk Annual #1.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-08 23:17:03. [CVDB734701]
ComicInfo.Writer: Bryce Ingman, Dean Motter, Hunt Emerson, Lisa R. Jonte, Robert Jeschonek
ComicInfo.Penciller: Carly Wright, Greg Scott, Hunt Emerson, Molly Stanard, Shawn Crystal, Carly Wright, Greg Scott, Hunt Emerson, Molly Stanard, Shawn Crystal
ComicInfo.Inker: Carly Wright, Greg Scott, Hunt Emerson, Molly Stanard, Shawn Crystal, Carly Wright, Greg Scott, Hunt Emerson, Molly Stanard, Shawn Crystal
